intro: Microseris tenella, commonly known as the slender stem rocket, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Brassicaceae, which includes many other mustard family plants. The plant is characterized by its slender, branching stems and small, white or pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round, yellowish pods that contain several seeds. Microseris tenella is often found in dry, disturbed soils and is adapted to a variety of environmental conditions.
